website_summaries.verdict: For cancer patients receiving chemotherapy, alkaline water has been shown to be extremely beneficial. Qure bottled alkaline water gets top marks for its pH levels, which are among the highest we found. It's packed with other beneficial minerals as well. Worth the investment.
pros: 9+ pH levels verified through home testing
Very good flavor profile, almost sweet
Contains beneficial levels of potassium and magnesium
cons: Contains mother of pearl oyster shell extract, a possible allergen
Bottles and shipping have some quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: Best Water on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best water on the market today! The taste is perfect and pure, but the effects this water has on your body are even better. This alkaline water has helped turn my stomach woes around. I suffer from IBS and have for 10+ years. I previously drank Essensia but Qure is 10x better. Not only is it more alkaline than Essensia is, but it had a better effect on my body and my stomach. I know the price of this water may seem high, but it is 100% worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Qure Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of this water it is almost sweet tasting and I do not use it all the time because I don't want to get my pH way out of balance. So far, I have not tasted the plastic bottle leaching into the water like some bottles do.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I found this water at Ross and really loved it. I tried finding it at Wal-Mart but couldn't. When I found it here I was so happy! I don't drink any other water if it isn't this. The water tastes so much better and is great for working out because it has electrolytes. Highly recommend if you're looking for alkaline water.
customer_reviews.author: Daycie R.

customer_reviews.title: Qure water my savior due to Laryngitis Acid Reflux.
customer_reviews.text: Wish you would bring back the smaller bottles. So much easier to handle. Please...... It's like drinking something silky, sounds odd, but it really does. I have to watch my acid and this truly helps me, my Doctor told me about alkaline water and my acid reflux is much better. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: SHARI SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Best high PH water I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: My brain likes to pick up ANY taste it can out of water and use it as an excuse to not drink it and with this there is none of that. In fact, the taste and slickness of the water literally make me want to drink more.
customer_reviews.author: Shari D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing this water for my mom who is a terminal cancer patient. Drinking regular bottled water caused severe stomach problems for. Since she started drinking this water her stomach problems have disappeared. This water is a little more expensive than other waters with a lower pH, but if it helps my mom feel better then it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: EJ'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Never seen anything like that before
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is unusually thin and flimsy. Never seen anything like that before. Water taste just ok. Did not notice any benefits and extremely pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious. Has all ingrediants for healthful water.
customer_reviews.text: I take a large amount of diuretics and therefore must drink at least 2 liters of water. Prefer this over Essentia.
customer_reviews.author: LeeZee

customer_reviews.title: ITEM  DELIVERY UNACCEPTABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered damaged! Outside box torn and retapped. Inside box ripped open water bottles scatted and appeared damage. This is my drinking water for medical purposes but I cannot drink water that Appears ti be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Hiwartha V. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor -no flavor!- just water!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this water has no flavor...just refreshing water! I have it on auto-delivery. The only downside is that some of my deliveries have been a little mishandled by the driver, but other than that, I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottles not all full.
customer_reviews.text: Case came with two bottles which were only half-filled. At what we are charged to purchase alkaline water, this was wholly unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd G.

customer_reviews.title: Taste smooth
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by this water. It has helped him tremendously with acid reflux. Just wish I was able to get larger bottle and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived damaged and the box the water bottles were was damaged as well. Hardly had to open the box and then the bottles were falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Decent price
customer_reviews.text: Like the water , didn't like the bottle it was in , easy to tip over
customer_reviews.author: Michon LePage-Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Quality is priceless
customer_reviews.text: Mother gas cancer and it help maintain her health while going through chemotherapy. Dr was amazed with her journey and results.
customer_reviews.author: Bronsha

customer_reviews.title: Seems just fine
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. If it contains all that it says, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: I purchase Qure water for my husband who has gout ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase Qure water for my husband who has gout. He swears by this water. It's expensive but it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water
customer_reviews.text: This water is great tasting. High pH and tastes really good ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Collins

customer_reviews.title: I love the water
customer_reviews.text: I love the water. It has a smooth taste. I gave it a 4 because several of the bottles expanded on the bottom and therefore will not stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bottles
customer_reviews.text: Last 2 shipments have had several bottles with bent top portion
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Rivera

customer_reviews.title: A necessary item.
customer_reviews.text: Hope this does the job of correcting my PH balance. Have ordered more, and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Charline D. Lacoe

customer_reviews.title: The most important is the crisp clean taste...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried plenty of water an Qure is the best yet!!
customer_reviews.author: NDH

customer_reviews.title: Great 9.5ph water
customer_reviews.text: Clean tasting and great packaging. Been drinking Qure for years and it's the best and healthiest water on the market. You have to try some.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and quality
customer_reviews.text: The only bottled alkaline water I buy! Great taste and quality!
customer_reviews.author: rnfb32

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Water tasted amazing... If I didn't have a water purifier I would continue to purchase this. The taste is by far the best I've ever had as far as water is concerned.
customer_reviews.author: D Mac

product_meta.title: Qure Alkaline Water, 33.8 Ounce (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: We are redefining how alkaline water is made. With a nature inspired unique proprietary process, Qure Alkaline Water is designed to refresh, renew and revitalize your body. Qure is the non-acidic beverage choice designed to complement a balanced and active lifestyle. 12 counts.
feature_bullets: Alkaline Water with a Stable High pH of 10
Qure’s unique proprietary process is inspired by Mother Nature’s water cycle
Made with traces of high quality blend natural occurring ionic alkaline minerals and electrolytes
Perfectly compelling non acidic choice to complement a balanced and active lifestyle
Distinguished smooth and silky taste will leave you feeling refreshed, renewed and revitalized
Try Qure now and taste and feel the difference for yourself!
